text:
Standard | Head of ML Data and Infrastructure | SF

We're using an all vision pipeline to build the checkout process of the future, and the data and ML infrastructure is as complex as for autonomous vehicles. We're looking for a fantastic lead to build a world class team and internal infra to enable our cutting edge research and product.

https://venturebeat.com/2018/09/07/standard-cognition-beats-...

Send me a message at jordan [at] standard [dot] ai
